>  "Your mind is for having ideas, not holding them." - David Allen
Meet **Waz**, a friendly text-based chatbot that helps you managed your tasks with ease.
It's simple, fast and ~~stressful~~ STRESS-FREE to use!
- Add events with date and time
- Add deadlines with date and time ⏰
- Mark and unmark tasks as done ✅
3. Start adding your tasks (todo, event, deadline)
4. Let Waz remember things for you 😉
* The {@code Waz} class represent the main chatbot application that manages tasks.
* Waz allows the user to add todos, events, and deadlines, mark tasks as done,
* unmark tasks, delete tasks, search for tasks, and exit the program by typing "bye".
* It handles user input, parses commands, executes them, and interacts with storage and UI.
* Initialises the Ui, storage, and loads task from the file
* Generates a response for the user's chat message.
* Represents a command to add {@link Deadline} task to the task list

*     and adds it to the {@link TaskList}, updates the Ui, save the updated list to storage.
* Constructs an AddDeadlineCommand with the given task description, deadline

* @param storage the storage to save the updated task list
* @throws WazException if the description, /by parts are missing or empty
public String execute(TaskList tasks, Ui ui, Storage storage) throws WazException {

* Represents a command to add {@link Event} task to the task list

if (isDescriptionEmpty) { // Check if /from is missing or description is empty
throw new WazException("A event task needs a description!");
throw new WazException("A event task must include /from and /to!");
String[] time = commandParts[1].split("/to", 2); // from and to
boolean isTimeEmpty = time.length < 2 || isStartTimeEmpty || time[1].trim().isEmpty(); // Check start & end time
assert time[0].trim().isEmpty() && time[1].trim().isEmpty() : "/from and /to must be " + "specified";

throw new WazException("A event task must include /from and /to!");

* Executes the command with access to the task list, Ui, storage

* @param storage the storage to persist changes
